content:
Hi kar2on

Seems your SEO is on point :)

Great article, in regard to the acquiring and using a Kindle.

Just a suggestion in regard to amending your article:

**Purchases:
I've been able to purchase kindle books with both the Maybank Visa (RM10K limit) and MasterCard (RM5K limit) with MSOS (Maybank Secure Online Shopping) activated that can be done by calling the number at the back of your card. The charge is reflect in dollars, but usually a double charge.
http://pic.twitter.com/PtpUWGtTWT

When purchasing books from either UK or US, both can be purchased by changing your address under "Manage Your Kindle."

**Devices:

Using Kindle on other devices is also easier, but obvious the hampering point is the battery.

Could a nice addition for people who don't want to go through the hassle of buying a new device.
